text: Easy Come, Easy Go is a 1947 American drama movie. John Farrow directed it. Barry Fitzgerald, Sonny Tufts, Diana Lynn, Dick Foran, Frank McHugh, Allen Jenkins, Arthur Shields, Frank Faylen, and Ida Moore acted in it. Paramount Pictures distributed it. ==Other websites== *Easy Come Easy Go at TCMDB *Easy Come, Easy Go at IMDb Category:1947 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Farrow Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Easy Come, Easy Go (1947 movie)
